API documentation for the jdl Decklink support library for dsj

© 2009, Nils Peters,
humatic GmbH,
Berlin, Germany.



jdl is an extension to dsj providing access to proprietary interfaces on Decklink DirectShow filters.
The term Decklink is generally used here for hardware accessible through Blackmagic Design's Decklink SDK and does not only refer to boards that are actually named "Decklink" in some way.

See:
          Description

Packages
de.humatic.jdl  

 


API documentation for the jdl Decklink support library for dsj

© 2009, Nils Peters,
humatic GmbH,
Berlin, Germany.



jdl is an extension to dsj providing access to proprietary interfaces on Decklink DirectShow filters.
The term Decklink is generally used here for hardware accessible through Blackmagic Design's Decklink SDK and does not only refer to boards that are actually named "Decklink" in some way.
Blackmagic Design and Decklink are registered trademarks of Blackmagic Design Pty. Ltd. humatic is not related to Blackmagic Design in any form and jdl is not a Blackmagic Design product.
For information on the native api, download the Decklink SDK from blackmagic-design.com
To start examining the jdl api, point your browser to the Decklink class, which provides a central accesspoint to Decklink filters inside a DSFiltergraph.
